item.title: Telluride: Richard Linklater on ‘Nouvelle Vague,’ Selling It to Netflix and France’s Oscar Choice
item.description: The veteran filmmaker, whose ‘Blue Moon’ is also playing at this year’s fest, weighs in on Trump’s threatened tariffs on films made outside of the U.S., the status of his 20-year ‘Merrily We Roll Alon

item.title: Netflix Sets ‘Nouvelle Vague’ Awards Season Release Dates — Theatrical and Streaming — and Categories (Exclusive)
item.description: THR is also debuting new stills from Richard Linklater’s homage to ‘Breathless’ and the French New Wave, which premiered in May at the Cannes Film Festival, where it received rave reviews.
